description: Strength and Endurance each represent a pair of two values: a minimum value (between 20-55) points) and a maximum value (between 65-90 points)
Strength and Endurance each represent a pair of two values: a minimum value (between 20-55)points) and a maximum value (between 65-90 points)
Luck is a single value between 5-95%.The values get assigned randomly at the beginning of the game
